Plot: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.
Title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Writer: Hunter S. Thompson (book), Terry Gilliam (screenplay), Tony Grisoni (screenplay), Tod Davies (screenplay), Alex Cox (screenplay)
Actors: Johnny Depp, Benicio Del Toro, Tobey Maguire, Ellen Barkin
tomatoConsensus: Visually creative, but also aimless, repetitve, and devoid of character development.
